Service.Name: WMS
Service.Title: Bruenvi / View Service for Inspire
Service.Abstract: Service mapping data visualization Brussels Environment for INSPIRE

ContactPersonPrimary.ContactPerson: Geodata at bruxelles dot environnement dot be

inspire_common:Specification.inspire_common:Title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

Layer.Name: Bruxelles Environnement / Leefmilieu Brussel
Layer.Title: Bruenvi / View Service for Inspire
Layer.Abstract: Service mapping data visualization Brussels Environment for INSPIRE

Layer.Name: bruenvi_public_green_area
Layer.Title: Public green spaces
Layer.Abstract: Database of green spaces and recreational areas in the Brussels-Capital Region, accessible to the public

Layer.Name: bruenvi_natural_reserve
Layer.Title: Nature and forest reserves
Layer.Abstract: Data on the nature and forest reserves in the Brussels-Capital Region . Official name of the reserve; date of the legal act identifying the reserve; type of reserve

Layer.Name: bruenvi_seveso_area
Layer.Title: Sites Seveso
Layer.Abstract: this directive has as an aim the prevention of the major accidents implying of dangerous substances and the limitation of their consequences for the man and the environment, in order to ensure in a coherent and effective way in all the country of the high levels of protection. The geographical data file SEVESO consists of several classes of objects which make it possible to locate all the SEVESO sites on the territory of the area of Brussels.

Layer.Name: bruenvi_natura_2000_habitat
Layer.Title: Habitats Natura 2000
Layer.Abstract: habitats classified by their EU code, within the Natura 2000 sites. Informations on the code of the station and a brief description of the habitat.

Layer.Name: bruenvi_natura_2000_station
Layer.Title: Natura 2000 Station
Layer.Abstract: subsites (stations) classified by their code, within the Natura 2000 sites. Information on the nature and name of each site, code and name of euch subsite.

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_singel_object
Layer.Title: Hydrographic network
Layer.Abstract: The Area of Brussels-Capital remains majority in the catchment area of the Senne

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_monitoring_groundwater_quality
Layer.Title: Water monitoring groundwater quality
Layer.Abstract: The Brussels Region has a network of monitoring or measurement of the quality or quantity of its groundwater status.

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_protectedsite_drinking_water_gallery
Layer.Title: Protection zone of collecting
Layer.Abstract: Galerie drainante (ou filtrante), creusée au cœur de la nappe aquifère et longue de plusieurs centaines de mètres, dans le Bois de la Cambre et la Forêt de Soignes

KeywordList.Keyword: zone de captage d eau potable
zone protegee de captage d eau

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_protectedsite_drinking_water
Layer.Title: Protection zones of collecting - drainage gallery and collecting wells
Layer.Abstract: Zone of well of collecting in Sonian Forest

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_groundwaterbody
Layer.Title: Water groundwaterbody
Layer.Abstract: Subsoil water subterranean water and more precisely the 5 masses…

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_monitoring_river_quality_phch
Layer.Title: Water monitoring river quality phch
Layer.Abstract: Network having for objective to supervise the physicochemical parameters related to the oxygen assessment, the temperature, the pH… It also supervises the presence of dangerous substances at the entry and the exit of the principal water ways of Brussels.

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_monitoring_river_fish
Layer.Title: Water monitoring river fish
Layer.Abstract: 7 points of measurement; this network makes it possible to control the quality and the conformity of water of the rivers classified like piscicultural

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_watershed
Layer.Title: Under basins slopes
Layer.Abstract: Delimitation by watersheds, inside which all fallen water feeds the same discharge system

Layer.Name: bruenvi_european_protected_areas
Layer.Title: European protected areas
Layer.Abstract: Register of the Protected areas

Layer.Name: bruenvi_areas_limitation_aircraft_noise
Layer.Title: Areas limitation aircraft noise
Layer.Abstract: Three zones of intervention, where limiting values on the acceptable level noise maximum that the populations can undergo flown over and which cannot be exceeded during given time

Layer.Name: bruenvi_protection_area_sonian_forest
Layer.Title: Protection area sonian forest
Layer.Abstract: Pieces of vulnerable plantation or regeneration, zones refuges for fauna, zones weakened in the process of recolonisation

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_sewage_treatment
Layer.Title: Water sewage treatment
Layer.Abstract: Treatment plant treating wastewater and the Flemish Woluwe basin from the Brussels-Capital

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_bodies_surface
Layer.Title: Water bodies surface
Layer.Abstract: The Brussels-Capital has three water bodies surface, two are heavily modified, the Senne and Woluwe and the Canal is artificial

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_protectedsite_drinking_water_wells
Layer.Title: Protectedsite drinking water wells
Layer.Abstract: location of extraction wells for drinking water Brussels operated by VIVAQUA. Classified as zone 1 protection capture (and the drainage gallery)

KeywordList.Keyword: water supply of the city water supply

Layer.Name: bruenvi_water_monitoring_groundwater_level
Layer.Title: Monitoring groundwater level
Layer.Abstract: localization of the sites measuring of the level (or stations piezometric) of subterranean water managed by Brussels Environment (IBGE)

Layer.Name: bruenvi_air_monitoring_stations
Layer.Title: Air monitoring stations
Layer.Abstract: localization of the various measuring sites of the quality of the air managed by Brussels Environment (IBGE).

Layer.Name: bruenvi_noise_monitoring_stations
Layer.Title: Noise monitoring stations
Layer.Abstract: localization of the various measuring sites of the noise levels, managed by Brussels Environment (IBGE)
